name: Super Mario Builder
description:
A Sandbox style Super Mario World.


_______________

Current features:

Set world size. (Temporary)

saving/loading maps.

Building. (Removing/Placing tiles)

Player control.

Tile menu and hotbar.

Only ten different tiles.

Only one placeable entity. (Goomba.)

Chunk style world loading (Work in progress), to eventually allow for infinite worlds.

Runs on Windows, Linux or MacOS!

________________________________________________________________________________

Planned for immediate future:

Custom world size.

Better chunk loading.

Tile settings. (Warp location for pipes, set items for ? blocks, ect.)

Player spawn location.

___________________                                             _______

Controls:

1-0: Hotbar shortcuts.

TAB: Menu for selecting tiles.

WASD: Movement, looking up, crouching.

SPACE: Jump.

INSERT: Toggle FPS and tile grid.

DELETE: Saves your currently open map. ("Ironic, but I threw it on this button while making this function because it was easy and the button wasn't used.")

Left-click: Remove/Place tiles depending on what hotbar key is selected.

Right-click: Meow.

ALT/OPTION: Toggle camera mode. (Player control/Free camera)

SHIFT: Lets you highlight multiple tiles at once while held, also in free camera mode, it will move the camera faster.
